comments.body: No more `^`? Has the syntax changed or are we now doing a different thing?

We were doing it correctly but having `+test` for some things and `^scripted` for other things is unnecessary because we can use `+` for everything. I did this change so that `sbt ci-release` works out-of-the-box.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +4,8 @@if [[ $(git diff master --name-only | grep sbt-metals) ]]; then
  echo "Diff detected in sbt-metals, running scripted tests"
  sbt "+sbt-metals/scripted"
else
  echo "No diff detected in sbt-metals, skipping scripted tests"
